WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. S/V PAMPLEMOUSSE IN NEED OF FUEL AND REQUESTING
   ASSISTANCE IN 04-55N 051-22W AT 181230Z NOV. VESSELS
   IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRSC CAYENNE,
   INMARSAT-C: 4227 99024, TELEX: 42912008,
   PHONE: 59 459 430 4444, FAX: 59 459 425 9130,
   E-MAIL: CAYENNE@MRSCFR.EU.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2717/12.
